deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title BiometricIdentityManager
 @dev Contract for managing decentralized identity using biometric hashes

@dev Registers a user's decentralized identity by storing a hashed biometric
 @param _biometricHash The hash of the user's biometric data

@dev Updates the stored biometric hash for a user
 @param newBiometricHash The new biometric hash to store

@param _requester The address of the entity requesting access
 @param _duration The duration for which access is granted (in seconds)

@dev Revokes access before expiration
 @param _requester The address of the entity whose access is being revoked

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Guardian cannot be the identity owner"

arguments.value: Guardian cannot be the identity owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Guardian cannot be the identity owner"

documentation.text:
@dev Allows a user to assign a guardian for identity recovery
 @param _guardian The address of the guardian

@dev Removes a guardian assigned for recovery
 @param _guardian The address of the guardian to remove

devdoc.details: Contract for managing decentralized identity using biometric hashes

addGuardian(address).details: Allows a user to assign a guardian for identity recovery

checkAccess(address,address).details: Checks if a requester has valid access

params._requester: The address of the entity requesting access

returns._0: bool True if access is valid

getBiometricHash(address).details: Gets the biometric hash for a user

getGuardian(address).details: Gets the guardian for a user

params._duration: The duration for which access is granted (in seconds)
params._requester: The address of the entity requesting access

identityExists(address).details: Checks if an identity exists for a given address

params._requester: The address of the entity requesting access
params._success: Whether the access attempt was successful
params._timestamp: The timestamp of the access attempt

recoverIdentity(address,bytes32).details: Allows a guardian to reset a user's identity

params._newBiometricHash: The new biometric hash to assign

registerIdentity(bytes32).details: Registers a user's decentralized identity by storing a hashed biometric

params._biometricHash: The hash of the user's biometric data

removeGuardian(address).details: Removes a guardian assigned for recovery

params._guardian: The address of the guardian to remove

params._requester: The address of the entity whose access is being revoked

updateIdentity(bytes32).details: Updates the stored biometric hash for a user

params.newBiometricHash: The new biometric hash to store

verifyIdentity(address,bytes32).details: Verifies if the given biometric hash matches the stored hash

returns._0: bool True if access is valid

devdoc.title: BiometricIdentityManager
